product_name: BeautyBioThe Quench Eye Pro-Strength Brightening Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsThe Quench Eye Pro-Strength Brightening Balm is an instantly nourishing under-eye balm. BeautyBio's buildable formula fills in fine lines, firms and brightens in one application.
details: DetailsBenefitsRestores 4 essential lipids critical to under-eye rejuvenation and a youthful appearance around the eye areaSupports elastin and collagen synthesis for a reduction of dark circlesWorks to inhibit wrinkle formation.Research ResultsIn a consumer perception survey after using The Quench Reviving Eye Balm for 30 days:97% said their skin felt softer87% agreed their eye area appeared smoother84% saw an improvement in skin's texture94% felt the eye area was more hydrated77% saw an improvement in brightening around the eye area81% noticed a decrease in the appearance of fine linesKey IngredientsOlive Oil Rich in antioxidants that fight off environmental aggressors and free radicals and traps moisture in skin for a healthy, glowing lookItem 2600085How To UseSTEP 1: Cleanse skin and pat dry.STEP 2: Scoop a small amount of The Quench Eye balm with the spatula provided and glide product onto under-eye area.STEP 3: Using your fingertips, gently dab balm into skin until completely blended.For AM + PM use.IngredientsWater/aqua/eau, Glycerin, Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Glyceryl Stearate, Jojoba Esters, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/capric/myristic/stearic Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprylate/dicaprate, Niacinamide, Tridecyl Stearate, Ethyl Macadamiate, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Paraffin, PPG-12/smdi Copolymer, PEG-100 Stearate, Beeswax/cera Alba/cire D'abeille, Cetyl Alcohol, Pullulan, Squalane, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract, Acmella Oleracea Extract, Dipeptide Diaminobutyroyl Benzylamide Diacetate, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Malic Acid, Tocopherol, Darutoside, Capryloyl Glycerin/sebacic Acid Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Diheptyl Succinate, Hexylene Glycol, Steareth-10, Steareth-20, Sodium Polyacrylate, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Disodium EDTA.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: STEP 1: Cleanse skin and pat dry.STEP 2: Scoop a small amount of The Quench Eye balm with the spatula provided and glide product onto under-eye area.STEP 3: Using your fingertips, gently dab balm into skin until completely blended.For AM + PM use.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I love this product the sales rep, Soad from beauty bio recommended !

reviews.headline: Natural Glow without glitter!
reviews.comments: I can't believe I'm writing this review because who has the time but when something works this good you need to share your experience. My 33 year old skin looks phenomenal! It's so moisturizing and soft on my skin with a beautiful glow.

reviews.headline: AMAZING!
reviews.comments: Easily the BEST anti-aging deeply hydrating moisturizer I've ever used!!!! I've not only purchased the entire live for myself but family members and it's worth every penny. A LITTLE goes a long way!

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again.
reviews.comments: The best face cream I have ever used.

reviews.headline: Wasn't for me
reviews.comments: This face cream was so expensive and I felt it didn't work for me. It made my face very sensitive and my foundation didn't stay well on top it. I was disappointed but will try something new.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I am loving the results of these products.

reviews.headline: 100 stars!!!!
reviews.comments: I've tried MANY MANY moisturizers. this one is THE BEST hands down! Use it day 1 and your face feels like a babys butt the very next day. That's how fast and amazing this stuff works. Nothing will make your skins feel this soft and supple. And no breakouts! (a few moisturizers make me break out for some reason but not this) The only downside is the price; it's horrendously expensive so I hafta wait until my bday & xmas gift cards and rewards points to buy it so I only buy it about once a year. A little goes along way so I can make it last a few months. I'm 56 with normal to dry skin.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I have used it for a week now. Like the way my skin feels I use it at night. Packaging is a little over the top. Contents is a lot smaller than it appears from the outside.

reviews.headline: Will be my forever ðŸ˜­
reviews.comments: I've used estee lauder, sheseido, kiehls, you name it many things. However, nothing has made the difference this facial cream made on me. I was constantly breaking out, I had large pores, texture, conbination skin. I just did not look healthy. It's been less than 2 weeks and OMG my skin looks beautiful, its pricey but Honestly its worth it! I feel 100% recommended. . I'll be loyal forever â™¡

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: This is so creamy and luxurious. It melts into my skin and makes my skin so hydrated that I glow!

reviews.headline: Finally my skin is happy
reviews.comments: I was having a lot of issues with my skin due to stress, hormones and a move to a different climate.  My skin is finally clear and happy!

reviews.headline: Best moisturizer ever!!!
reviews.comments:
My completion has never look this good.  I love it. 
It make my face smooth and glowing. I'm 63 years old.

reviews.headline: Expensive Cerave
reviews.comments: Literally the same ingredients in Cerave with lactic acid and some ingredients that can cause an allergic reaction and are potentially irritating added. As a cosmetic chemist and dermatologist, I would never recommend this to my patients. Go with Cerave and use a lactic acid serum or toner.

reviews.headline: Love the product!
reviews.comments:
I use it at night. The next day my face is smooth and silkily. 
 so far no break out.

reviews.headline: Love a balmy eye cream
reviews.comments: Love how hydrating it is, my concealer stays smooth & it's brightened my under eyes being consistent with the product day/night. I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: So I never ever leave reviews, however this is the EXCEPTION. I have sensitive, dry skin, and have hormonal acne. I've been struggling to find a moisturizer that actually provides hydration and relief to my face. I have tried SO SO many different kinds of moisturizers, but this is the only one that actually works. For the first time in my life, I woke up without my skin feeling tight and flaky. I used a mild BHA exfoliant, a calming serum, and then this moisturizer, and I woke up feeling like a new person. I know it's expensive but my god does it work.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love
reviews.comments: Fabulous moisturizer! I have tried hundreds and this is my absolute favorite. Not oily but hydrating. It definitely results in smoother and nearly flawless skin!

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again. I have very dry skin.
reviews.comments:
I have some eczema on my face. Other serums and moisturizers would dry out and my foundation would show the flaking of my skin. This is the only one that doesn't. I've spent LOTS of money on moisturizers
This moisturizer also doesn't look oily or greasy!!!

reviews.headline: Great formula, HORRIBLE packaging.
reviews.comments: I got a sample for this cream and was so impressed that I ordered the full size, even though it was so expensive. After getting the product, I realized right away why and it's nothing to do with the cream itself and more with the horrible packaging. I wish this company would get rid of the ridiculous tube looking pot that is completely useless, wasteful and doesn't even do a good job of keeping the product in and instead, gave the customer more product. It's so beyond extra in a very bad way. I was so disappointed the cream itself it's only 1.7 oz! That's $73.50 per oz. If someone like me loves this cream but hates the pkg and price, please let us know if you have found a dupe for it.

reviews.headline: HADE TO RETURN THIS PRODUCET
reviews.comments: I USED IT TWICE AND IT GAVE ME A RASH

faceoff_positive.comments: This moisturizer is everything I ever dreamed of! My skin is very sensitive and also am dealing with hormonal acne around my jawline, this moisturizer feels so buttery yet quenches my skin.  Best when used after i micro needle. I can definitely feel how supple and moisturized my skin looks and feels. I wish it was cheaper, because i honestly don't think i could afford purchasing it every month.. the only downside to this AMAZING moisturizer.
